name: Chain Knight
description:
Prototype for Godot Mini Jam #9 - features 9 levels (time of completion ~ 9 mins)

The game is unfinished. It was one of my first Godot games (having previously used Unity) so if you’re looking for a super polished game this is not it. Having said that I’m satisfied with how it turned out and look forward to continuing to make games and improve. 

  •  All art and assets are original
  • No sound

Theme: ‘Chain’, ‘Only one’

Play the game in browser or download. It's very quick but quite fun.
